testsuite.name: br.com.unifal.blog.integration.UserServiceIntegrationTest

testcase.name: #findById > When the id is null > Thrown an exception
#findById > When the id is not null > When a user is found > Return the user
#findById > When the id is not null > When no user is found > Throw an exception
